item.description:
This will be my first day back easing into running after the marathon so I will be running easy for the entire month. Great time for new runners to join the group for 11-12 minute miles or even slower if you'd like.

We also have plenty of quicker runners do don't let my plan keep you from attending. Ideally this slow period will be used to grow the group of regulars so we can all run at a comfortable pace.
item.how_to_find_us: Easy to sput runners in the parking lot
item.name: Pier 1 - Sunday Run
